page.title: 09 Farming
page.content: Farming in these blocks is nearly all dairy-farming.Most of the cows are black and white Freisian.Every cow has a different black and white pattern. A typical farm. Owner-Mr R.Gregson Address-Hanbury House Farm Type of Farm-Dairy. Acreage-175 No.of workmen-2 full time Cows in milk or calf-75 Yearlings or in-calf heifers-45 Calves-15 Young bullocks-23 Ewes-58 Rams-1 Lambs-95 Border/LeicesterxSuffolk Machinery-2 mowers,1 swathe-turner 3 tractors,1 baler, Type of milking parlour-Herringbone The farmhouse is over 200 years old and is built of brick and wood.
